column17:
Product Description

A rich moisturizing cream with a sweet balsamic floral aroma enriched with Lavender essential oil that calms and heals ideal for oily and combination skin. A delicately scented hand cream enriched with soothing lavender essential oil healing cedarwood oil and pure ylang ylang essential oil. Apricot oil and beeswax help heal cracks and smoothen skin. Ingredients: Cold pressed apricot oil beeswax lavender cedarwood and ylang ylang essential oil.
